title: Social Determinants of Health in [Large-Scale] Medical Education: Chronological Composition-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and public health concepts
context.additional_context: Training for healthcare institution managers/leaders to understand social determinants of health through real-case analysis and explore organizational improvement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish structural/intermediary determinants of health with ≥85% accuracy
Learners can construct chronologies (life histories) based on real-world cases to analyze the impact of social determinants
Learners can propose ≥3 practical strategies for improving health equity through team-based activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
